hackathon-description-text: The chapters of the National Society of Black Engineers (NSBE) and the Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers (SHPE) at Lehman College are teaming up this year to bring you our 4th annual hackathon! Our focus is on highlighting, supporting, and encouraging student talent from underrepresented and diverse backgrounds and provide a platform for you to build amazing things for your community.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Take your project to the next "cloud" level with $250 AWS Credit for the team with the best use of Amazon Web Services!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Team with the best domain name using Domain.com registrar service wins a Raspberry Pi & PiHut Essential Kit.
Bose SoundlLink Bluetooth Speakers (1 for each team member) provided by JP Morgan Chase & Co
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Hack for Empowering Minority Entrepreneurs

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winning team will receive Amazon Fire TVs and Game Controllers provided by Viacom!
$250 Amazon Gift Cards for each member of the winning team
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Financial Hack using the Capital One Nessie API

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Gillet Hall, 250 Bedford Park Blvd W, Bronx, NY 10468, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Does the solution successfully address the chosen challenge and overall theme; how so or how effectively does it do so?
Did the you put thought into the user experience and functionality of your solution?
What kind of growth and impact will your solution produce?
How innovative and creative is the solution provided?
How technically impressive, interesting, and/or difficult was the solution?

hackathon-location-address: Gillet Hall, 250 Bedford Park Blvd W, Bronx, NY 10468, USA
hackathon-description-header: Build something amazing for a diverse and inclusive future!
